name: Kingdom of the Worm
description:
Kingdom of the Wörm is a Homage to the maze games of the golden age of videogames. Although updated with graphics and music resembling the 16 bite era. It started out as a remake of K.C.'s Krazy Chase from the Odyssey 2 console but got a bit bigger during development. It now features elements from the following games:

-    Pac Man (of course)
-    Jr. Pac Man
-    Lady Bug
-    Turtles
-    K.C. Munchkin
-    Pac'n'Pal
-    Super Pac Man
-    Nibbler
-    K.C.'s Krazy Chase (of course)

It features 20 levels with new gameplay elements being constantly introduced throughout the game.
Oh, there is a cheat you can enable. Press 'c' on the options screen to enable it.

I hope you have a little fun with it.
